ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned about the complexity of Portuguese fiction and the lives of these interesting authors.

I was able to greatly improve my writing after not doing literary analysis for quite some time. With the help of Professor Jackson and Julia, I also learned to make my paper theses stronger and more concise.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I think the course assigned slightly too many readings and didn't allow enough room for each reading to be fully analyzed.

The course's largest strength was how interesting and unique the material was and how well the authors=s' works could be connected to each other. I also thought it was ideal because there was a perfect amount of time spent on each work and author and it was not just a cursory analysis. I would have liked to hear more about the motivations behind certain plot points in the material, but I understand that some of the books were very detail-heavy.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would recommend this course to any student who has interest in any or all of the authors, as they are amazing and similar in certain ways. Professor Jackson is very kind and knows so much about lusophone cultures so it is always captivating to hear him lecture on these authors. He also went over the material well and I often found myself noticing more of the intricacies of the texts in class. The works we read are amazing.
